body:
Adds versions+sha256 hashes for linux-headers versions
2.6.19.1 through 5.13.13 (current).  Earlier versions
added and commented out as the headers_install target
wasn't available back then.

Adds generate-versions.sh to allow mostly-automatic
regeneration of versions as new kernels are created.

Modifies "spack versions" to prevent spidering, as that
scales poorly to thousands of tarballs. Returns and
empty dictionary instead.  Definitely a temporary solution.
title: linux-headers:  new versions, maintainer
